name: GeoGuesser Hacker
description: AI-powered location analysis for GeoGuessr. Analyzes screenshots to provide precise geographic coordinates and location predictions.
AI-powered location analysis for GeoGuessr. Uses Firebase-hosted GeoCLIP for precise coordinate prediction with StreetCLIP fallback.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://extensionpay.com https://us-central1-geoguesser-hacker-ext.cloudfunctions.net https://geoclip-api-4xswevyldq-uc.a.run.app http://localhost:8081 http://localhost:8082 http://localhost:8083; object-src 'self'
